pli-tv-pvr2.3:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for a lustful nun consenting to a lustful man making physical contact with her, to how many of the four kinds of failure do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.2: They belong to two kinds of failure:
pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.3: they may be failure in morality; they may be failure in conduct. …
pli-tv-pvr2.3:2.1: When it comes to the offenses for asking for curd and then eating it, to how many of the four kinds of failure do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.3:2.2: They belong to one kind of failure:
pli-tv-pvr2.3:3.1: The third section on failure is finished.
